title: This Website
description: Personal portfolio website I built and deployed to showcase my projects, skills, hobbies.

title: Weast
description: A multi-purpose discord.py bot with over 500 active users.

title: Scholarly
description: A real-time tutoring application designed for school and university students to schedule live video chat sessions with instructors to seek help.

title: Urban Translate
description: An Android/IOS app which provides urban definitions to various slang terms and translates slang sentences to plain english using NLP.

title: Promedio
description: A student companion web application that allows students to track their grades, calculate their GPA, and set goals for their academic performance.

title: CartMax
description: An Android app that enabled users to shop for groceries online during the pandemic.
